title: Dark mode not turning off at sunrise after June 2020 update
content:
Dark Mode is configured to turn on at sunset and off at sunrise,
which had been working fine, but after the June 2020 update,
it no longer turns off at sunrise. It's as if the phone doesn't think
sunrise has occurred. Location is on, so that's not the cause.
Anyone? Thanks.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
